title: Login servers are down?
body:
Can't login to the normal or alpha client. Stuck on logging in screen.

Edit: Never mind finally logged in on the 4th try. Ill just delete this.

replies.body:
12 times but still cant log in gg
 
Edit:  15 times logged in pls fix this wasted 20 min

I'm getting that also

Edit: took me about 6 times to log in also.

Wonder what is going on here

Same here. Multiple attempts to log-on, not working. Internet is working properly.

Edit update : After trying for 5 mins or so, was able to finally log-in.
